name: entidi/silverstrap
description: A SilverStripe theme based on Bootstrap front end framework

suggest.entidi/silverstrap-cerulean: Silverstrap customization that uses the Cerulean theme from bootswatch.com
suggest.entidi/silverstripe-autotoc: A module compatible with silverstrap that automatically generates table of contents
suggest.entidi/silverstripe-carousel: A carousel page type supported out of the box by silverstrap
suggest.entidi/silverstripe-gallery: A gallery page type supported out of the box by silverstrap
